mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_rsvd ORDER BY in_date asc
SELECT * FROM tbl_rsvd where id = #{id} ORDER BY in_date asc
SELECT * FROM tbl_rsvd where store_id = #{storeId} and user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY in_date asc
SELECT * FROM tbl_rsvd where store_id = #{storeId} ORDER BY in_date asc
SELECT * FROM tbl_rsvd where store_id = #{storeId} and stus_cd = #{stusCd} ORDER BY in_date asc
SELECT * FROM tbl_rsvd where store_id = #{storeId} and TO_CHAR(in_date,'YYYYMMDD') = #{today} ORDER BY in_date asc
SELECT * FROM tbl_rsvd where store_id = #{storeId} and TO_CHAR(in_date,'YYYYMMDD') = #{date} ORDER BY in_date asc
SELECT * FROM tbl_rsvd where user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY in_date asc

select count(*), d.menu_nm from ( select id from tbl_rsvd where TO_CHAR(in_date,'YYYYMMDD') = #{date} and store_id = #{storeId} ) r, tbl_rsvd_dtls d where r.id = d.rsvd_id GROUP BY menu_nm ORDER BY COUNT(*) desc

SELECT r.id, r.store_id, r.user_id, r.htdl_id, r.aprv_no, r.pnum, r.time, r.stus_cd, r.tot_amt, r.tot_qty, r.in_date, d.rsvd_seq, d.menu_nm, d.menu_tot_qty, d.menu_prc FROM tbl_rsvd r, tbl_rsvd_dtls d WHERE r.id = d.rsvd_id and r.id = #{rsvdId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_rsvd(id, store_id, user_id, htdl_id, aprv_no, pnum, time, stus_cd, tot_amt, tot_qty,in_date) VALUES (seq_rsvd.nextval,#{storeId},#{userId},#{htdlId},#{aprvNo},#{pnum},#{time},#{stusCd},#{totAmt},#{totQty},sysdate)

select seq_rsvd.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO tbl_rsvd(id, store_id, user_id, htdl_id, aprv_no, pnum, time, stus_cd, tot_amt, tot_qty,in_date) VALUES (#{id},#{storeId},#{userId},#{htdlId},#{aprvNo},#{pnum},#{time},#{stusCd},#{totAmt},#{totQty},sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_rsvd SET store_id = #{storeId}, user_id = #{userId}, htdl_id = #{htdlId}, aprv_no = #{aprvNo}, pnum = #{pnum}, time = #{time}, stus_cd = #{stusCd}, tot_amt = #{totAmt}, tot_qty = #{totQty} where id = #{id}
